summary: App to manage "composants" and assign/duplicate them across existing "bancs" without recreating from scratch.

existing_features.title:
Add a post-creation UI flow on the Bench Detail page to duplicate an existing component from the current bench to one or more other existing benches.

UI/UX:
- In the components table (Health Book) actions column, add an action to open a “Duplicate / Copy” flow for a specific component.
- The flow must allow selecting one or multiple target benches from existing benches (excluding the current bench by default).
- On confirm, duplicate the selected component to the selected benches using the backend duplication method.
- Show success/error toasts and refresh component data for impacted benches.

Add a during-creation UI flow in the “Add New Test Bench” modal to allow extending (duplicating) a newly-created component to other existing benches.

Behavior:
- While adding a component in the Components (Health Book) section, provide a control to choose additional existing benches to also receive a copy of that component.
- When the new bench is created, also duplicate the selected component(s) into the selected existing benches (after the new bench creation succeeds).
- The copied components must have `associatedBenchId` set to the target bench IDs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add ability to extend/duplicate a "composant" to other existing "bancs" during creation and after creation via a "copier/dupliquer" toggle, allowing reassignment without rebuilding from scratch.

Add backend support to duplicate an existing component into one or more target benches without requiring the user to recreate it from scratch.

Implementation scope:
- Add a new shared method that takes a `Component` payload and a list of `targetBenchIds`.
- For each `targetBenchId`, validate the bench exists, then append a copied component into that bench’s component list in `componentMap`.
- Ensure the copied component’s `associatedBenchId` is set to the target bench ID (not the source bench).
- Write a history entry for each target bench indicating a component was duplicated into it.
- Enforce the same authorization checks as existing component management methods.

projectName: Allow duplicating a component to other existing benches during creation and after creation
